00042 static int verbose = 0; // 0=minimal output, 1=verbose output
00043 
00044 struct Event
00045 {
00046     // Event() : dr(3) {}
00047     int destination;
00048     double rate;
00049     votca::tools::vec::vec dr;
00050 };
00051 
00052 
00053 class Node
00054 {
00055     public:
00056         int id;
00057         int occupied;
00058         int injectable;
00059         double escaperate;
00060         double occupationtime;
00061         vector<Event> event;
00062     
00063         double EscapeRate();
00064         // double CurrentEscapeRate(Node node2);
00065         // void Jump(Node node2);
00066         void AddEvent(int seg2, double rate12, votca::tools::vec::vec dr);
00067         void InitEscapeRate();
00068 };
00069 
00070 
00071 void Node::AddEvent(int seg2, double rate12, votca::tools::vec::vec dr)
00072 {
00073     Event newEvent;
00074     newEvent.destination = seg2;
00075     newEvent.rate = rate12;
00076     newEvent.dr = dr;
00077     this->event.push_back(newEvent);
00078 }
00079 
00080 
00081 void Node::InitEscapeRate()
00082 {
00083     double newEscapeRate = 0;
00084     for(unsigned int i=0; i<this->event.size();i++)
00085     {
00086         newEscapeRate += this->event[i].rate;
00087     }
00088     this->escaperate = newEscapeRate;
00089     // cout << "Escape rate for segment " << this->id << " was set to " << newEscapeRate << endl;
00090 }
00091 
00092 
00093 double Node::EscapeRate()
00094 {
00095     return escaperate;
00096 }

00099 class Chargecarrier
00100 {
00101     public:
00102         int position;
00103         int id;
00104         Node *node;
00105         votca::tools::vec::vec dr_travelled;
00106 };

00108 
00109 void progressbar(double fraction)
00110 {
00111     int totalbars = 50;
00112     std::cout << "\r";
00113     for(double bars=0; bars<double(totalbars); bars++)
00114     {
00115         if(bars<=fraction*double(totalbars))
00116         {
00117             std::cout << "|";
00118         }
00119         else
00120         {
00121             std::cout << "-";
00122         }
00123     }
00124     std::cout << "  " << int(fraction*1000)/10. <<" %   ";
00125     std::cout << std::flush;
00126     if(fraction*100 == 100)
00127     {
00128         std::cout << std::endl;
00129     }
00130 }

00132 
00133 int OMPinfo() 
00134 {
00135     int nthreads=1, tid=0, procs, inpar=0;
00136     printf("\n||\n|| openMP PARALLEL COMPUTATION STATUS:\n");
00137     #pragma omp parallel private(tid)
00138     {
00139         # ifdef _OPENMP
00140         tid = omp_get_thread_num();
00141         if (tid == 0) 
00142         {
00143             procs = omp_get_num_procs();
00144             nthreads = omp_get_num_threads();
00145             inpar = omp_in_parallel();
00146             printf("|| Number of processors = %d\n", procs);
00147             printf("|| Number of threads = %d\n", nthreads);
00148     
00149         }
00150         # endif
00151         if (tid == 0) 
00152         {
00153             printf("|| In parallel? = %d\n||\n", inpar);
00154         }
00155     }
00156     return nthreads;
00157 }

00189 void KMCMultiple::Initialize(const char *filename, Property *options )
00190 {
00191         if (options->exists("options.kmcmultiple.runtime")) {
00192             _runtime = options->get("options.kmcmultiple.runtime").as<double>();
00193         }
00194         else {
00195             throw runtime_error("Error in kmcmultiple: total run time is not provided");
00196         }
00197 
00198 //      if (options->exists("options.kmcmultiple.outputtime")) {
00199 //          _dt = options->get("options.kmcmultiple.outputtime").as<double>();
00200 //      }
00201 //      else {
00202 //          throw runtime_error("Error in kmcmultiple: output frequency is not provided");
00203 //        }
00204 
00205         if (options->exists("options.kmcmultiple.seed")) {
00206             _seed = options->get("options.kmcmultiple.seed").as<int>();
00207         }
00208         else {
00209             throw runtime_error("Error in kmcmultiple: seed is not provided");
00210         }
00211         
00212         if (options->exists("options.kmcmultiple.numberofcharges")) {
00213             _numberofcharges = options->get("options.kmcmultiple.numberofcharges").as<int>();
00214         }
00215         else {
00216             throw runtime_error("Error in kmcmultiple: number of charges is not provided");
00217         }
00218 
00219         if (options->exists("options.kmcmultiple.injection")) {
00220             _injection_name = options->get("options.kmcmultiple.injection").as<string>();
00221         }
00222         else {
00223             throw runtime_error("Error in kmcmultiple: injection pattern is not provided");
00224         }
00225 
00226         if (options->exists("options.kmcmultiple.allowparallel")) {
00227             _allowparallel = options->get("options.kmcmultiple.allowparallel").as<int>();
00228         }
00229         else {
00230             cout << "WARNING in kmcmultiple: You did not specify if parallel computation is allowed. It will be disabled." << endl;
00231             _allowparallel = 0;
00232         }
00233 
00234         _filename = filename;
00235 
00236        //cout << _seed << endl;
00237        //srand(_seed);
00238        //votca::tools::Random::init(rand(), rand(), rand(), rand());
00239 }
00240 
00241 vector<Node*> KMCMultiple::LoadGraph()
00242 {
00243     string injectionpattern = "*";
00244     
00245     vector<Node*> node;
00246     
00247     // Load nodes
00248     votca::tools::Database db;
00249     db.Open( _filename );
00250     if(verbose >= 1) {cout << "LOADING GRAPH" << endl << "database file: " << _filename << endl; }
00251     votca::tools::Statement *stmt = db.Prepare("SELECT id-1, name FROM segments;");
00252 
00253     int i=0;
00254     while (stmt->Step() != SQLITE_DONE)
00255     {
00256         Node *newNode = new Node();
00257         node.push_back(newNode);
00258 
00259         int newid = stmt->Column<int>(0);
00260         string name = stmt->Column<string>(1);
00261         node[i]->id = newid;
00262         if (votca::tools::wildcmp(injectionpattern.c_str(), name.c_str()))
00263         {
00264             node[i]->injectable = 1;
00265         }
00266         else
00267         {
00268             node[i]->injectable = 0;
00269         }
00270         i++;
00271     }
00272     delete stmt;
00273     if(verbose >= 1) { cout << "segments: " << node.size() << endl; }
00274     
00275     // Load pairs and rates
00276     int numberofpairs = 0;
00277     stmt = db.Prepare("SELECT seg1-1 AS 'segment1', seg2-1 AS 'segment2', rate12h AS 'rate', drX, drY, drZ FROM pairs UNION SELECT seg2-1 AS 'segment1', seg1-1 AS 'segment2', rate21h AS 'rate', -drX AS 'drX', -drY AS 'drY', -drZ AS 'drZ' FROM pairs ORDER BY segment1;");
00278     while (stmt->Step() != SQLITE_DONE)
00279     {
00280         int seg1 = stmt->Column<int>(0);
00281         int seg2 = stmt->Column<int>(1);
00282         double rate12 = stmt->Column<double>(2);
00283         votca::tools::vec::vec dr = votca::tools::vec::vec(stmt->Column<double>(3), stmt->Column<double>(4), stmt->Column<double>(5));
00284         node[seg1]->AddEvent(seg2,rate12,dr);
00285         numberofpairs ++;
00286     }    
00287     delete stmt;
00288 
00289     if(verbose >= 1) { cout << "pairs: " << numberofpairs/2 << endl; }
00290     
00291     // Calculate initial escape rates
00292     for(unsigned int i=0; i<node.size(); i++)
00293     {
00294         node[i]->InitEscapeRate();
00295     }
00296     return node;
00297 }
00298 
00299 vector<double> KMCMultiple::RunVSSM(vector<Node*> node, double runtime, unsigned int numberofcharges, votca::tools::Random2 *RandomVariable)
00300 {
00301     int tid = 0;
00302     # ifdef _OPENMP
00303     tid = omp_get_thread_num();
00304     # endif
00305 
00306     if(tid == 0)
00307     {
00308         cout << endl << "Algorithm: VSSM for Multiple Charges" << endl;
00309         cout << "number of charges: " << numberofcharges << endl;
00310         cout << "number of nodes: " << node.size() << endl;
00311     }
00312     
00313     if(numberofcharges > node.size())
00314     {
00315         throw runtime_error("ERROR in kmcmultiple: specified number of charges is greater than the number of nodes. This conflicts with single occupation.");
00316     }
00317 
00318     double outputfrequency = runtime/100;
00319     vector<double> occP(node.size(),0.);
00320 
00321     // Injection
00322     vector< Chargecarrier* > carrier;
00323     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < numberofcharges; i++)
00324     {
00325         Chargecarrier *newCharge = new Chargecarrier;      
00326         newCharge->id = i;
00327         newCharge->node = node[RandomVariable->rand_uniform_int(node.size())];
00328         while(newCharge->node->occupied == 1 || newCharge->node->injectable != 1)
00329         {   // maybe already occupied? or maybe not injectable?
00330             newCharge->node = node[RandomVariable->rand_uniform_int(node.size())];
00331         }
00332         newCharge->node->occupied = 1;
00333         newCharge->dr_travelled = votca::tools::vec::vec(0,0,0);
00334         if(tid == 0) {cout << "starting position for charge " << i+1 << ": segment " << newCharge->node->id+1 << endl; }
00335         carrier.push_back(newCharge);
00336     }    
00337 
00338     double time = 0.;
00339     int step = 0;
00340     double nextoutput = outputfrequency;
00341     
00342     progressbar(0.);
00343     while(time < runtime)
00344     {
00345         // determine which electron will escape
00346         Node* do_oldnode;
00347         Node* do_newnode;
00348         Chargecarrier* do_affectedcarrier;
00349         double maxprob = 0.;
00350         double newprob = 0.;
00351         votca::tools::vec::vec dr;
00352         for(unsigned int i=0; i<numberofcharges; i++)
00353         {
00354             newprob = carrier[i]->node->EscapeRate() * (1-RandomVariable->rand_uniform());
00355             if(newprob > maxprob)
00356             {
00357                 maxprob = newprob;
00358                 do_oldnode = carrier[i]->node;
00359                 do_affectedcarrier = carrier[i];
00360             }
00361         }
00362         if(maxprob == 0) {throw runtime_error("ERROR in kmcmultiple: all rates are 0") ;}
00363         if(verbose >= 1 && tid == 0) {cout << "Charge number " << do_affectedcarrier->id+1 << " which is sitting on segment " << do_oldnode->id+1 << " will escape!" << endl ;}
00364         
00365         // determine where it will jump to
00366         if(verbose >= 1 && tid == 0) {cout << "There are " << do_oldnode->event.size() << " possible jumps for this charge:"; }
00367         maxprob = 0;
00368         for(unsigned int j=0; j<do_oldnode->event.size(); j++)
00369         {
00370             if(verbose >= 1 && tid == 0) { cout << " " << do_oldnode->event[j].destination ; }
00371             newprob = do_oldnode->event[j].rate * (1-RandomVariable->rand_uniform());
00372             if(newprob > maxprob)
00373             {
00374                 maxprob = newprob;
00375                 do_newnode = node[do_oldnode->event[j].destination];
00376                 dr = do_oldnode->event[j].dr;
00377             }
00378         }
00379         
00380         if(verbose >= 1 && tid == 0) {cout << "." << endl;}
00381 
00382         // go forward in time
00383         double accumulatedrate = 0;
00384         for(unsigned int i=0; i<numberofcharges; i++)
00385         {
00386             accumulatedrate += carrier[i]->node->EscapeRate();
00387         }
00388         double dt = 0;
00389         if(accumulatedrate == 0)
00390         {   // this should not happen: no possible jumps defined for a node
00391             throw runtime_error("ERROR in kmcmultiple: Incorrect rates in the database file. All the escape rates for the current setting are 0.");
00392         }
00393         else
00394         {
00395             double rand_u = 1-RandomVariable->rand_uniform();
00396             while(rand_u == 0)
00397             {
00398                 cout << "WARNING: encountered 0 as a random variable! New try." << endl;
00399                 rand_u = 1-RandomVariable->rand_uniform();
00400             }
00401             dt = -1 / accumulatedrate * log(rand_u);
00402         }
00403         time += dt;
00404         step += 1;
00405         
00406         for(unsigned int i=0; i<numberofcharges; i++)
00407         {
00408             carrier[i]->node->occupationtime += dt;
00409         }
00410         
00411         
00412         // if the new segment is unoccupied: jump; if not: nothing??
00413         if(do_newnode->occupied == 0)
00414         {
00415             do_newnode->occupied = 1;
00416             do_oldnode->occupied = 0;
00417             do_affectedcarrier->node = do_newnode;
00418             do_affectedcarrier->dr_travelled += dr;
00419             if(verbose >= 1 && tid == 0) {cout << "Charge has jumped to segment: " << do_newnode->id+1 << "." << endl << endl;}
00420         }
00421         else
00422         {
00423             if(verbose >= 1 && tid == 0) {cout << "Selected segment: " << do_newnode->id+1 << " is alread occupied. No jump." << endl << endl;}
00424         }
00425         
00426         if(time > nextoutput && tid == 0)
00427         {
00428             nextoutput = time + outputfrequency;
00429             progressbar(time/runtime);
00430         }
00431     }
00432     progressbar(1.);
00433 
00434     
00435     // calculate occupation probabilities from occupation times    
00436     for(unsigned int j=0; j<node.size(); j++)
00437     {   
00438         occP[j] = node[j]->occupationtime / time;
00439     }
00440 
00441     if (tid == 0)
00442     {
00443         cout << endl << "finished KMC simulation after " << step << " steps." << endl;
00444         votca::tools::vec::vec dr_travelled = votca::tools::vec::vec (0,0,0);
00445         cout << endl << "Average velocities: " << endl;
00446         for(unsigned int i=0; i<numberofcharges; i++)
00447         {
00448             cout << std::scientific << "    charge " << i+1 << ": " << carrier[i]->dr_travelled/time*1e-9 << endl;
00449             dr_travelled += carrier[i]->dr_travelled;
00450         }
00451         dr_travelled /= numberofcharges;
00452         cout << std::scientific << "  Overall average velocity (m/s): " << dr_travelled/time*1e-9 << endl << endl;
00453     }
00454     return occP;
00455 }
00456 
00457 
00458 void KMCMultiple::WriteOcc(vector<double> occP, vector<Node*> node)
00459 {
00460     votca::tools::Database db;
00461     cout << "Opening for writing " << _filename << endl;
00462         db.Open(_filename);
00463         db.Exec("BEGIN;");
00464         votca::tools::Statement *stmt = db.Prepare("UPDATE segments SET occPh = ? WHERE id = ?;");  // electron occ. prob., check (think about) this
00465         for(unsigned int i=0; i<node.size(); ++i)
00466         {
00467             stmt->Reset();
00468             stmt->Bind(1, occP[i]);
00469             stmt->Bind(2, node[i]->id+1);
00470             stmt->Step();
00471         }
00472         db.Exec("END;");
00473         delete stmt;
00474 }
00475 
00476 bool KMCMultiple::EvaluateFrame()
00477 {
00478     std::cout << "-----------------------------------" << std::endl;      
00479     std::cout << "      KMC FOR MULTIPLE CHARGES" << std::endl;
00480     std::cout << "-----------------------------------" << std::endl << std::endl;      
00481  
00482     unsigned int numberofthreads = 1;
00483     if(_allowparallel == 1)
00484     {
00485         numberofthreads = OMPinfo();
00486     }
00487     
00488     // Initialise random number generator
00489     // each thread i in a parallel computation needs is own set RandomVariable[i]
00490     if(verbose >= 1) { cout << endl << "Initialising random number generator" << endl; }
00491     srand(_seed); // srand expects any integer in order to initialise the random number generator
00492     vector< votca::tools::Random2* > RandomVariable;
00493     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < numberofthreads; i++)
00494     {
00495         votca::tools::Random2 *newRandomVariable = new votca::tools::Random2();      
00496         RandomVariable.push_back(newRandomVariable);
00497         RandomVariable[i]->init(rand(), rand(), rand(), rand());
00498     }
00499     
00500     // VSSM KMC algorithm
00501     //cout << endl << "KMC SIMULATION" << endl;
00502     cout << "number of threads: " << numberofthreads << endl;
00503 
00504     vector<Node*> node;
00505     node = KMCMultiple::LoadGraph();
00506     vector<double> occP(node.size(),0.);
00507     vector< vector< double > > occPOneRun ( numberofthreads, vector<double> ( node.size(), 0. ) );
00508 
00509     # ifdef _OPENMP
00510     (void) omp_set_num_threads(numberofthreads);
00511     # endif
00512     #pragma omp parallel private(node)
00513     {
00514         node = KMCMultiple::LoadGraph();
00515         int thread = 0;
00516         # ifdef _OPENMP
00517         thread = omp_get_thread_num();
00518         # endif
00519         occPOneRun[thread] = KMCMultiple::RunVSSM(node, _runtime/numberofthreads, _numberofcharges, RandomVariable[thread]);
00520     }
00521 
00522     
00523     // get mean of multiple runs
00524     for(unsigned int j=0; j<occP.size();j++) 
00525     {
00526         for(unsigned int thread=0; thread<numberofthreads; thread++)
00527         {
00528             occP[j] += occPOneRun[thread][j];
00529         }
00530         occP[j] /= numberofthreads;
00531     }
00532     
00533     // output occupation probabilites
00534     for(unsigned int thread=0; thread<numberofthreads; thread++)
00535     {
00536         for(unsigned int j=0; j<occPOneRun[thread].size();j++) 
00537         {
00538             if(occPOneRun[thread][j] > 0)
00539             {
00540                 cout << "[thread " << thread+1 << "] "<<"occupation probability " << node[j]->id+1 << ": " << occPOneRun[thread][j] << endl;
00541             }
00542         }
00543     }
00544     // output occupation probabilites
00545     cout << endl;
00546     for(unsigned int j=0; j<occP.size();j++) 
00547     {
00548         if(occP[j] > 0)
00549         {
00550             cout << "occupation probability " << node[j]->id+1 << ": " << occP[j] << endl;
00551         }
00552     }
00553     
00554     // write occupation probabilites
00555     KMCMultiple::WriteOcc(occP, node);
00556     
00557     return true;
00558 }
